description:
The package includes a Momentum Harness, locking carabiner, belay device, chalk bag and a chalk ball. The Momentum harness is an affordable, all-around option that uses Dual Core Construction with a venting foam insert in the center to balance comfort and breathability without pressure points.

  • Bullhorn-shaped waist with Open Air foam is lightweight and breathable
  • Padded lumbar insert adds some comfort during extended hanging belays
  • Prethreaded SpeedAdjust buckle
  • Rocklock screwgate locking carabiner
  • ATC-XP belay device
  • Mojo Chalk Bag + chalk ball
  • Chalk bag and ATC colours vary. Consider this a known unknown
name: Black Diamond Momentum Package - Women's
